description: Audit all coderef ecosystem tools and commands, create synthesized current and active lists

orchestrator.role: Synthesize all agent outputs into master comprehensive list of tools and commands
orchestrator.notes: Orchestrator audit complete. Synthesized comprehensive audit of 6 MCP servers (coderef-context, coderef-workflow, coderef-docs, coderef-personas, coderef-testing, papertrail): 87 total MCP tools, 69 slash commands. Master list includes ecosystem summary, tool catalog by server, duplicates analysis (10 intentional duplicates identified), gaps analysis, and recommendations for consolidation and documentation.
